programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 WS Viral Wild | Ep. 1.12
programme.desc: Between babbling brooks and lazy rivers lives nature's perfect calm.

programme.title: Storm Hunters
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Storm Hunters | Dangerous Waters
programme.desc: The North Atlantic Ocean is generous with her bounty, until she takes a life in return. Mark braves the deep seas on the most dangerous day of the lobster fishing season.

programme.title: Storm Hunters
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Storm Hunters | Relentless Winter
programme.desc: Mark & Jaclyn chase extreme winter weather as Nor’easters hammer Atlantic Canada.

programme.title: Episódios 7-8
programme.desc: A Tormenta de 18 Dias | Um Novo Começo

programme.title: Safety123
programme.desc: Vistos de longe, os Alpes podem parecer uma fantasia pitoresca, mas quem vive no sopé sabe como podem ser ameaçadores.

programme.title: Ettore Bassi: Stage and Race
programme.desc: O ator italiano Ettore Bassi é conhecido pelo seu trabalho no cinema, televisão e teatro. Mas nem todos sabem que também é um piloto profissional de corridas de rampa. A sua vida divide-se com frequência entre as duas paixões e dois cenários muito diferentes: o palco ou a pista. Em 2022, as duas realidades chocam quando tem agendados um espetáculo e uma corrida, em lados opostos da Itália. Bassi decide dedicar-se aos dois projetos, sabendo que o sucesso é quase impossível. A sua escolha e determinação revelam muito acerca do homem e do seu passado...

programme.title: HairStyle, The Talent Show -Episódios 1 - 2
programme.desc: No primeiro episódio, para se apresentarem aos jurados, os participantes usam a sua capacidade de engenho para criar um visual livre e solto. O único limite é a sua capacidade criativa. Também serão avaliados quanto a cinco técnicas de cabeleireiro essenciais; o último classificado será eliminado. A celebridade televisiva e influencer de moda Tina Leung irá visitar o salão para revelar a sua rotina de cuidado capilar e oferecer algumas dicas valiosas.

programme.title: Campeãs
programme.desc: A vencedora de três medalhas olímpicas e Treinadora Feminina do Ano de 2012 da FIFA Pia Sundhage conta-nos como se sentiu quando foi convocada pela primeira vez pela seleção nacional feminina sueca. Pia acredita que o futebol lhe ofereceu um modo de vida. Pia conversa com Stina Blackstenius, vencedora de uma medalha de bronze na Copa do Mundo Feminina da FIFA e vencedora de duas medalhas de prata em Jogos Olímpicos, e com Molly Johansson, ambas jogadoras do BK Häcken. Stina conversa com as duas jogadoras sobre o que sentiu quando participou nos Jogos Olímpicos, e como jogar em França a tornou mais forte, enquanto Molly revela as suas metas para o futuro.

programme.title: I Am Breathing
programme.desc: Num ano, Neil Platt deixa de ser um homem saudável para ficar completamente paralisado do pescoço para baixo, devido à doença devastadora que herdou.

programme.title: We All Play
programme.desc: “WE ALL PLAY” é um projeto que explora a realidade da comunidade LGBTQIA+ no mundo do desporto. Através de uma viagem à volta do mundo, este documentário inspirador apresenta-nos atletas de elite extraordinários que, muitas vezes pela primeira vez, partilham as suas experiências pessoais e profissionais. Os seus testemunhos revelam visões diferentes e opiniões profundas sobre os triunfos e os desafios diários enfrentados por estes atletas. Dando ênfase à importância da inclusão e da aceitação, o documentário evidencia como o desporto pode constituir um espaço para a diversidade e o respeito, promovendo uma mudança positiva em todas as áreas do desporto e para além dele.

programme.title: Finding Hope Home
programme.desc: Os cineastas Wambui Ndegwa e Cole Lewis tornam a realidade queniana visível através da história de uma família que começou a adotar crianças sem-abrigo no Nairobi em 1996.

programme.title: Ona Carbonell: Começar de novo
programme.desc: Em agosto de 2020, a nadadora artística olímpica Ona Carbonell tornou-se mãe, uma experiência que mudou de imediato a sua vida. Ao mesmo tempo, Ona embarcou num plano ambicioso para competir nos Jogos Olímpicos de Tóquio. O documentário acompanha Ona durante estes 11 meses intensos, em que terá de forçar os seus limites a um grau extraordinário, tanto física como emocionalmente. Acompanhamos Ona de perto, partilhando as suas rotinas e desafios diários, desde a amamentação aos momentos de brincadeira com o bebé Kai, passando pelas sessões de treino intenso com a Seleção Nacional Espanhola.

programme.title: Daughters of the Sexual Revolution: The Untold Story of the Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders
programme.desc: Assinado pelo realizador nomeado para um óscar Dana Adam Shapiro, este filme intrépido apresenta-nos a história do sucesso repentino das Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders como uma metáfora para o clímax da revolução sexual dos EUA.

programme.title: Forgetting Dad
programme.desc: Um homem sofre um pequeno acidente de carro e, uma semana depois, constrói uma nova identidade, alegando que não consegue "lembrar-se" de que é pai. Quase vinte anos depois, a sua amnésia persiste, mas não foram encontrados dano cerebral ou qualquer causa física.

programme.title: Break Through
programme.desc: Uma peça encenada por estudantes de teatro torna-se num espetáculo subversivo em prol dos direitos LGBT.

programme.title: Anything is Possible
programme.desc: Serge Ibaka cresceu pobre e às vezes desabrigado nas ruas de Brazzaville. A sua mãe morreu quando Serge tinha 7 anos e, aos seus 12 anos, o seu pai foi à prisão. Apesar desses obstáculos esmagadores, alcançou o seu sonho de tornar-se um campeão da NBA. Este documentário acompanha a Serge na sua viagem de volta para a República do Congo, para mostrar o troféu do campeonato da NBA, mas mais importante, partilha uma mensagem de que, através de muito trabalho e determinação, "Anything is Possible"!

programme.title: Episódios 1-2
programme.desc: Um Clássico de Futebol | Território Inimigo

programme.title: Djon Africa
programme.desc: Miguel ouviu dizer que se parece muito com o seu pai, a quem nunca conheceu. Nesta história acompanhamo-lo numa busca poética por esse homem desconhecido entre as memórias e mitologias africanas.

programme.title: The Great Journey
programme.desc: Uma família filmada por dentro. O realizador regista a luta contra o cancro da sua mãe, o anúncio de gravidez da sua irmã e as obras de renovação da sala de estar dirigidas pelo seu pai.

programme.title: The Peddler
programme.desc: Daniel Burmeister, um cinéfilo de barbas, viaja de terra em terra a realizar filmes de muito baixo orçamento com os autóctones, e em tempo recorde!

programme.title: We All Play
programme.desc: “WE ALL PLAY” é um projeto que explora a realidade da comunidade LGBTQIA+ no mundo do desporto. Através de uma viagem à volta do mundo, este documentário inspirador apresenta-nos atletas de elite extraordinários que, muitas vezes pela primeira vez, partilham as suas experiências pessoais e profissionais. Os seus testemunhos revelam visões diferentes e opiniões profundas sobre os triunfos e os desafios diários enfrentados por estes atletas. Dando ênfase à importância da inclusão e da aceitação, o documentário evidencia como o desporto pode constituir um espaço para a diversidade e o respeito, promovendo uma mudança positiva em todas as áreas do desporto e para além dele.

programme.title: Discovering Canary Islands - T2: Gomera | El Hierro
programme.desc: A viagem continua em La Gomera, com uma primeira prova no frondoso Parque Nacional de Garajonay, onde terão de mostrar como se conseguem orientar às cegas para obter "objetos" que serão decisivos no desenvolvimento do episódio. Daí, "saltarão" para o Valle Gran Rey para fazer outro tipo de salto, o salto do pastor, uma técnica utilizada pelos antigos habitantes da ilha para se deslocarem em terrenos montanhosos, que lhes permitirá obter mais "objetos". Tudo o que foi conquistado pelos participantes será posto em jogo na Playa del Inglés, onde a força e a coordenação de cada equipa serão fundamentais no final desta etapa.

programme.title: HairStyle, The Talent Show -Episódios 5 - 6
programme.desc: Nem sempre é fácil agradar os clientes, mas os participantes não podem desiludir. Irão indicar os seus modelos e descobrir o que querem, para concretizarem os seus desejos na máxima medida possível. A atriz, modelo e celebridade televisiva e Christine Quinn irá visitar o salão e partilhar algumas das suas dicas de cuidados capilares com os participantes. No segundo desafio, os participantes irão trabalhar com modelos e dedicar-se à pintura de cabelo. Cada visual pode destacar a beleza natural da modelo, ao mesmo tempo que alimenta os seus cabelos, dado que as tintas podem ser prejudiciais.

programme.title: Break Point: a Davis Cup Story
programme.desc: Liderada por Rafa Nadal, a seleção espanhola era a favorita deste ano até sofrer um sério revés. O jogador número dois da equipa, Roberto Bautista, teve de deixar a disputa para voltar à sua cidade natal e ficar ao lado do pai nas últimas horas da sua vida. Sem o Bautista, Nadal e Feliciano López conseguiram heroicamente levar a equipa à final. Mas então veio a notícia que emocionou os fãs de ténis em todo o mundo: Bautista, após o funeral do seu pai, está de volta à competição e pronto para jogar. Unidos mais uma vez, os espanhóis lutam pela vitória na grande final, onde algo muito além do ténis está em jogo.

programme.title: Finding Hope Home
programme.desc: Os cineastas Wambui Ndegwa e Cole Lewis tornam a realidade queniana visível através da história de uma família que começou a adotar crianças sem-abrigo no Nairobi em 1996.

programme.title: Discovering Canary Islands - Episódio 5-6
programme.desc: Episódio 5 - La Palma | Episódio 6 - El Hierro and La Gomera

programme.title: Make Up Stars - T1: Na capa - Queens
programme.desc: Neste empolgante primeiro episódio do concurso de maquilhagem, conhecemos os oito concorrentes, que se enfrentarão ao desafio de criar maquilhagem editorial à altura de uma capa de revista. Conheceremos o júri: David Molina, um dos mais famosos maquilhadores do setor; e Camila Redondo, uma das vozes mais influentes no mundo online da beleza e maquilhagem. E a rainha indiscutível do TikTok, Lola Lolita, visitará os concorrentes. Não percas este novo concurso brilhante e com muito estilo.

programme.title: Karate-do: O Caminho de Sandra Sánchez
programme.desc: Não é um dragão, mas parece no dojo. Eis Sandra Sánchez, uma das maiores figuras do karate de sempre. Esta é a história do seu percurso único. Dos seus feitos. Uma história complicada que inclui a prática do karate em criança, uma relação abusiva na vida adulta e um penúltimo ano de carreira inacreditável onde que bateu recordes ao competir nos três mais prestigiosos campeonatos de karate – e vencê-los. O caminho até ao sucesso nunca é fácil, mas nos Jogos Olímpicos de Tóquio, Sandra lutou por e contra muitas dificuldades para conquistar um lugar nos anais da história.

programme.title: River Memories
programme.desc: Uma comunidade está prestes a desaparecer. Os habitantes de Platz, um enorme bairro de lata em Turim, Itália, defrontam-se com um plano imposto pelo governo e veem-se ameaçados pelo despejo. Este filme documenta os últimos meses do bairro.

programme.title: Forgetting Dad
programme.desc: Um homem sofre um pequeno acidente de carro e, uma semana depois, constrói uma nova identidade, alegando que não consegue "lembrar-se" de que é pai. Quase vinte anos depois, a sua amnésia persiste, mas não foram encontrados dano cerebral ou qualquer causa física.

programme.title: Make Up Stars - T1: Cor - Futuro
programme.desc: Os toucadores do Makeup Stars são tomados pela cor, com os concorrentes a enfrentar o primeiro desafio com a técnica de caracterização. Seguirão as instruções da maquilhadora Anna Cartés, especialista na técnica das perucas e em apagar as feições dos modelos para criar novas personagens. Agoney, um cantor camaleónico e fã da maquilhagem, visitará o programa para dar conselhos aos concorrentes. Quem será a ""Super Estrela"" e ganhará privilégios para o próximo episódio? Quem terá a pontuação mais baixa? Não percas uma explosão de cor.

programme.title: Campeãs
programme.desc: Carmen Arce, "Kubalita", guarda-redes da primeira seleção nacional feminina espanhola, parte de Valencia para Barcelona para conhecer Alexia Putellas, vencedora da Liga dos Campeões da UEFA e da Supertaça Europeia, e Viktoria Adrianova, ambas jogadoras do FC Barcelona. Antes do encontro, Alexia confessa não ser tão impaciente como outrora, Viky emociona-se ao recordar a sua lesão e Kubalita afirma que elas não se esconderam, apesar de os políticos e os meios de comunicação terem subestimado a sua atividade. Assim que se reuniram, trocaram impressões sobre o momento atual do futebol feminino.

programme.title: Episódios 5-6
programme.desc: Match Point | Noite Europeia

programme.title: Andrés Iniesta, O Herói Inesperado
programme.desc: Esta é a história de uma pessoa normal que faz coisas extraordinárias. Alguém que persegue e conquista triunfos cuidando dos pequenos detalhes, porque estes são, afinal, os que fazem dele um futebolista diferente. Todos conhecemos Iniesta, o mágico da bola que conquistou dois triples campeonatos com o Barça e levantou a Copa do Mundo com a seleção espanhola. E sim, é claro que conhecemos os seus grandes momentos desportivos. Mas quem está por trás dessa estrela mundial do desporto?

programme.title: 265 Days Without Waves (265 dias sem ondas)
programme.desc: Uma história única e extraordinária sobre a criação por um grupo de surfistas locais de uma comunidade e cultura de surf apesar das limitações, numa costa que mal chega aos 100 dias de ondas por ano. Através das personagens, exploramos a evolução do surf bem como a exponencial mudança socioeconómica de Barcelona e arredores, da década de 1960 até à atualidade. Entre os protagonistas aventureiros e dedicados, conhecemos os pioneiros que nadaram contra a maré e a nova geração que vive e respira o surf de uma forma completamente diferente. Frustração, espera e desespero combinam-se em igual medida com entusiasmo, perseverança e humor.

programme.title: We All Play
programme.desc: “WE ALL PLAY” é um projeto que explora a realidade da comunidade LGBTQIA+ no mundo do desporto. Através de uma viagem à volta do mundo, este documentário inspirador apresenta-nos atletas de elite extraordinários que, muitas vezes pela primeira vez, partilham as suas experiências pessoais e profissionais. Os seus testemunhos revelam visões diferentes e opiniões profundas sobre os triunfos e os desafios diários enfrentados por estes atletas. Dando ênfase à importância da inclusão e da aceitação, o documentário evidencia como o desporto pode constituir um espaço para a diversidade e o respeito, promovendo uma mudança positiva em todas as áreas do desporto e para além dele.

programme.title: Make Up Stars - T1: Natureza - E o vencedor é...
programme.desc: Na semifinal, os concorrentes enfrentarão um desafio de pintura corporal em que terão de representar um dos quatro elementos naturais, sob a orientação de Corinne Pérez. Contarão com a assistência dos antigos concorrentes e receberão a visita de umas das mais influentes maquilhadoras das redes sociais e uma verdadeira especialista em pintura corporal: Nuria Adraos. A jovem artista dará conselhos aos concorrentes, enquanto estes lutam por um lugar na final.

programme.title: I Am Breathing
programme.desc: Num ano, Neil Platt deixa de ser um homem saudável para ficar completamente paralisado do pescoço para baixo, devido à doença devastadora que herdou.

programme.title: Discovering Canary Islands - Episódio 1-2
programme.desc: Episódio 1 - Lanzarote | Episódio 2 - Fuerteventura

programme.title: Campeãs
programme.desc: A vencedora da Bundesliga e jogadora do AC Milan Julia Simic parte de Nuremberga para apanhar Dafina Redzepi (TSG Hoffenheim) e visitar Bärbel Wohlleben, que tem a honra de ter sido a primeira mulher que marcou um Golo do Mês da ARD Sportschau. Julia mostra-nos o campo de futebol que criou para que as raparigas possam começar a jogar, enquanto Bärbel recorda os seus anos de infância e o modo como a federação alemã de futebol (DFB) baniu as mulheres da prática do futebol profissional. As três irão jogar nas margens do Reno enquanto conversam sobre a paixão que partilham pelo futebol.

programme.title: HairStyle, The Talent Show -Episódios 5 - 6
programme.desc: Nem sempre é fácil agradar os clientes, mas os participantes não podem desiludir. Irão indicar os seus modelos e descobrir o que querem, para concretizarem os seus desejos na máxima medida possível. A atriz, modelo e celebridade televisiva e Christine Quinn irá visitar o salão e partilhar algumas das suas dicas de cuidados capilares com os participantes. No segundo desafio, os participantes irão trabalhar com modelos e dedicar-se à pintura de cabelo. Cada visual pode destacar a beleza natural da modelo, ao mesmo tempo que alimenta os seus cabelos, dado que as tintas podem ser prejudiciais.

programme.title: Discovering Canary Islands - T2: Lanzarote | Fuerteventura | Gran Canaria
programme.desc: A aventura começa em Lanzarote, no espetacular Charco de la Novia, onde uma prova aquática individual emocionante determinará a formação de duas equipas de 4 concorrentes: a equipa azul e a equipa amarela. Para além disso, a prova dará ao vencedor um privilégio que terá de exercer no final do capítulo: trocar um dos membros da sua equipa por um membro da equipa adversária. Contudo, antes disso, as duas equipas irão enfrentar-se em duras provas nos Jameos del Agua, no Charco de San Ginés e no Castillo de San Gabriel, onde entrará também em jogo o Talismã de Magec, que dará imunidade a um dos membros da equipa vencedora.

programme.title: Ona Carbonell: Começar de novo
programme.desc: Em agosto de 2020, a nadadora artística olímpica Ona Carbonell tornou-se mãe, uma experiência que mudou de imediato a sua vida. Ao mesmo tempo, Ona embarcou num plano ambicioso para competir nos Jogos Olímpicos de Tóquio. O documentário acompanha Ona durante estes 11 meses intensos, em que terá de forçar os seus limites a um grau extraordinário, tanto física como emocionalmente. Acompanhamos Ona de perto, partilhando as suas rotinas e desafios diários, desde a amamentação aos momentos de brincadeira com o bebé Kai, passando pelas sessões de treino intenso com a Seleção Nacional Espanhola.

programme.title: Total Legends! 1970-1979

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.desc: It's karaoke night at Robs place. That means lots of bad singing and lots of great food. It's a ribapolooza! Rob bbqs some smoked spareribs, spicy beef short ribs and fresh grilled veg for his wanna be stars.

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.desc: Grilling expert Spencer Watts hosts a tasty beef-a-palooza with four incredible beef cuts including smoked brisket and succulent beef tenderloin.

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Barbeque isn’t Just for Meat
programme.desc: Barbeque is not just about meat! Chef Spencer Watts shows us how to grill fruits and vegetables like a pro.

programme.title: Fresh Market Dinners
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Honeycomb, Shallots and Iceberg Lettuce
programme.desc: Host Amanda Herrera transforms fresh market ingredients into two irresistible dishes, including a one pot Lamb Curry with Honeycomb.

programme.title: Fresh Market Dinners
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Patty Pan Summer Squash and Cabbage
programme.desc: Host Amanda Herrera grills up two dinner recipes using patty pan summer squash and cabbage that she picked up from the market.

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.desc: Rob is born to be wild - Hog Wild that is! Rob and his motorcycle riding friends cruise the streets for charity then head back to Rob's for the post parade party. The hungry bikers don't rebel when he serves up a picnic pork roast, funky potato packages, tamarind shrimp, plus sauces and sides galore.

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.sub-title: S03 : E04 Taste of India Celebration
programme.desc: Tales from Rob's friend of his adventures in India entice Rob to grill up an Indian flavored feast. He puts together spicy mouth-watering dishes like lobster tails in curry butter, roasted curried potatoes, decadent lamb steaks and a carrot salad to help cool things down.

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.desc: Matt and the Team to cook up a midsummer feast. Leg of Lamb with Summer Herbs, Rosemary Grilled Pork Tenderloin with Wild Berry Sauce, Grilled Trout with Peaches, and a Tomato Salad have the locals raiding the market to stay stocked on the season's best.

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.desc: Matt and the Road Grill Team spend the day playing around the Water Park. The Spit Roasted Lemon-Lime Butter Chicken, Grilled Swordfish Skewers with Caribbean Salsa, and Smokey Spareribs with BBQ Sauce result in a big splash with this pool loving crowd.

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.desc: Chef Spencer starts this spicy barbeque episode with flavours from Thailand with a Bok Choy with a Ginger Chili Sauce. Powerful bird's eye chilies are packed into a sweet and spicy sauce and served over tasty grilled bok choy. Spencer then introduces us to Calabrian chilies, mashed into a spice paste and rubbed on butterflied chicken that then gets grilled to flame-kissed perfection. Next, Spencer gives fresh calamari some heat with Korean chilies that add their distinctive heat and flavour before grilling this scrumptious recipe and serving it over a comforting bed of rice and peas. Finally, Spencer prepares Seekh Kabobs, made with ground lamb spiked with punchy dried Kashmiri chilies...

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.desc: First stop on Chef Spencer's Spanish flavour tour? Habanero Char-Grilled Octopus - warmed up with punchy chilies and balanced with a sweet and tangy sherry vinaigrette. Next, Spencer stuffs whole sea bass with citrus and herbs, gives it the grill treatment and then tops it with olive oil blistered cherry tomatoes. The rotisserie does the heavy lifting for Mr. Watts' whole roast chicken - spiked with bright Spanish flavours like Spanish chilies and smoked paprika, slow cooked and served extra juicy. Finally, Spencer prepares a classic Spanish recipe: Paella. Loaded saffron rice, piled high with chorizo, veggies, and shellfish. Of course, Spencer's Paella is made in the Spanish tradition;...

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.sub-title: S02 : E07 Caribbean Bon Voyage Fiesta
programme.desc: In honour of Rob's neighbors' grand prize win of all expenses paid cruise to the Caribbean, Rob prepares a Caribbean Feast. Smoked Pork loin in a passion fruit applesauce, jerk snapper and island salsa are all on his menu as the celebration begins in his backyard.

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.desc: Rob is having a wine & cheese party with a bunch of his closest friends. From the lamb chops to the lobster tails - he combines the wine and cheese into every element of the delicious grilled menu

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.desc: In between hoisting sails and scrubbing the deck, Matt and his team prepare a feast for the sailors before going on a long voyage. Not only is the weather perfect for sailing, it's perfect for BBQing! The menu: Scallop Corn Bacon Burger, Maple-apple Brined Pork Chops, Grilled Tuna Bruschetta, and Strawberry Marscapone Trifle.

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.desc: Teddy Bears of all age, shape, and size join our grill team with their owners for a day of games, rides and some teddy bear repair. Matt & the RG team are BBQing a menu even the pickiest eater will love. The menu: Grilled Almond Butter & Banana Sandwiches, Grilled Meatball Sub, Smoked White Cheddar Macaroni, and Quick & Snappy Ginger Lemon Ice Cream Sandwiches.

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.desc: New neighbors move in across the street all the way from Southern Italy and Rob decides to do an all-Mediterranean bbq dinner in their honour. Hot of the grill are octopus, sardines and Moroccan lamb kabobs along with some mouthwatering sides that will make his guests feel right at home.

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.desc: It's karaoke night at Robs place. That means lots of bad singing and lots of great food. It's a ribapolooza! Rob bbqs some smoked spareribs, spicy beef short ribs and fresh grilled veg for his wanna be stars.

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.desc: Grilling expert Spencer Watts hosts a tasty beef-a-palooza with four incredible beef cuts including smoked brisket and succulent beef tenderloin.

programme.title: Watts On the Grill

programme.desc: Barbeque is not just about meat! Chef Spencer Watts shows us how to grill fruits and vegetables like a pro.

programme.title: Fresh Market Dinners
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Honeycomb, Shallots and Iceberg Lettuce
programme.desc: Host Amanda Herrera transforms fresh market ingredients into two irresistible dishes, including a one pot Lamb Curry with Honeycomb.

programme.title: Fresh Market Dinners
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Patty Pan Summer Squash and Cabbage
programme.desc: Host Amanda Herrera grills up two dinner recipes using patty pan summer squash and cabbage that she picked up from the market.

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.desc: Rob is born to be wild - Hog Wild that is! Rob and his motorcycle riding friends cruise the streets for charity then head back to Rob's for the post parade party. The hungry bikers don't rebel when he serves up a picnic pork roast, funky potato packages, tamarind shrimp, plus sauces and sides galore.

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.sub-title: S03 : E04 Taste of India Celebration
programme.desc: Tales from Rob's friend of his adventures in India entice Rob to grill up an Indian flavored feast. He puts together spicy mouth-watering dishes like lobster tails in curry butter, roasted curried potatoes, decadent lamb steaks and a carrot salad to help cool things down.

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.desc: Matt and the Team to cook up a midsummer feast. Leg of Lamb with Summer Herbs, Rosemary Grilled Pork Tenderloin with Wild Berry Sauce, Grilled Trout with Peaches, and a Tomato Salad have the locals raiding the market to stay stocked on the season's best.

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.desc: Matt and the Road Grill Team spend the day playing around the Water Park. The Spit Roasted Lemon-Lime Butter Chicken, Grilled Swordfish Skewers with Caribbean Salsa, and Smokey Spareribs with BBQ Sauce result in a big splash with this pool loving crowd.

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.desc: Chef Spencer starts this spicy barbeque episode with flavours from Thailand with a Bok Choy with a Ginger Chili Sauce. Powerful bird's eye chilies are packed into a sweet and spicy sauce and served over tasty grilled bok choy. Spencer then introduces us to Calabrian chilies, mashed into a spice paste and rubbed on butterflied chicken that then gets grilled to flame-kissed perfection. Next, Spencer gives fresh calamari some heat with Korean chilies that add their distinctive heat and flavour before grilling this scrumptious recipe and serving it over a comforting bed of rice and peas. Finally, Spencer prepares Seekh Kabobs, made with ground lamb spiked with punchy dried Kashmiri chilies...

programme.title: MORE One Big Recipe

programme.title: MORE One Big Recipe
programme.desc: Re-join Chef Kimberly Lallouz in her One Big Recipe test kitchen as she masterfully creates a week night feast of Swiss chard and pea salad with green apple vinaigrette, broccoli and cheddar soup, salt crusted lamb loin with lamb gravy, and a green apple panna cotta with crispy cheddar frico.

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.sub-title: S01 : E15 How to Roast a Duck - Thai Style
programme.desc: Who doesn't love tender, juicy duck? Host Pailin Chongchitnant shows us how to roast a delicious duck, Thai-style.

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.sub-title: S01 : E16 Flavours of the Sea
programme.desc: Host Natalia Machado knows that cooking fish and seafood in Argentina means simple ingredients to let the natural flavours shine!

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.sub-title: S01 : E17 It's All About the Olive Oil
programme.desc: The greatest staple of Italian cuisine? Olive oil! Host Vanessa Gianfrancesco uses olive oil to make delightful Italian dishes.

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.desc: Hana Etsuko Dethlefsen features dishes like Japanese Chicken Wings and Chawanmushi for a lovely feast.

programme.title: A is for Apple
programme.desc: Here's a tongue twister: Theresa, tuna, tangerine! In this episode, host Theresa Visintin picks her favourite letter, "T," and introduces us to scrumptious recipes using tuna and tangerine. Theresa loves tuna and Italian cuisine, so naturally she combines both to create a mouth-watering pasta with some savoury tomato, olive, and tuna sauce. Next, Theresa satisfies her sweet tooth with a decadent tangerine parfait! Using the sweet juice of the tangerine, Theresa creates gelatin, with a hint of orange liqueur. She tops it all off by whipping up a fluffy cream to complete this sweet treat. Then it's time for a real challenge: tuna and tangerine in one recipe!

programme.title: A is for Apple
programme.desc: In this "H" challenge, Chef Lauren Gulyas decides to take on the unique flavours of halibut and horseradish. She starts with a perfectly prepared prosciutto wrapped halibut, pairing the buttery flavour of the fish with the saltiness of the cured meat. Throw in some dill potatoes and you've got a beautifully balanced dish. Next up, Chef Lauren show us how to make a delightful roast beef dip with a zesty horseradish sauce using carrots, vinegar, mayo and a little lemon. Finally, she is challenged to make a dish that combines both ingredients, and does she ever deliver!

programme.title: A is for Apple
programme.desc: In this letter "P" challenge, Chef Robert Jewell showcases his vegetarian skills using pecans and peppers. Despite his cowboy roots, Robert shows us he can kick it with vegetarians by cooking up a juicy meatless "meatloaf" using pecans. But, no "meatloaf" would be complete without a gravy! Robert fries up earthy portobello mushrooms before adding a special ingredient to thicken the gravy, you guessed it -- pecans! Now, on to peppers. Robert doubles up, using both the vegetable and seasoning, to make a delicious red pepper coulis with herb and pepper crusted beef tenderloin. Robert goes a little nuts when he prepares his final recipe using both pecans and peppers.

programme.title: The Wizard of Whatever
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Pancakes, Lobster Soup, Duck, and Flan
programme.desc: Chef Kyle Crawford unveils four spellbinding dishes! First up, wild rice pancakes! Next, lobster-lime soup! Followed by a Tuscan porchetta-style duck! Finishing with a flan with port-soaked cherries!

programme.desc: BLITZ! is an all-new cooking show! Imagine being next Erica Karbelnik as they cook their fav dishes!

programme.title: One BIG Recipe
programme.desc: What on earth and/or sea is super fun host Kim Lallouz cooking this week for her One Big Recipe? You guessed it - Surf and Turf! First on the beach are her Singapore-inspired Chili Crab Cakes, redolent with southeast Asian aromatics and spices like lemongrass, ginger, and galangal. 'Turf's up' next with a fresh off-the-hoof Marrow Toast plate decked out with melty marrow, crispy crostini, and garlicky parsley salad. We all deserve a creamy cheesy break (right?), so of course Risotto Carbonara with Crispy Pancetta and Enoki Mushrooms follows. Braised Veal Osso Bucco is the big deal main course, all shored up surfingly with scrumptious Seared Scallops and smoky Grilled Broccoli Rabe!

programme.title: CombiNation Plates
programme.desc: In this episode of CombiNATION Plates, host Bianca Osbourne starts in Mexico with her version of popular street snack, 'Esquites', re-invented here as sweet corn flan. Next is Norway, don't miss explosively exciting quick-smoked Arctic Char with Forage, you've NEVER seen anything like this before. The common ingredient is tacos! From Norway, 'Lefse' is a potato-flour 'tortilla' served with fresh berries and uniquely Scandinavian 'Brunost' cheese. Representing Mexico, check out spicy pork and pineapple 'Tacos al Pastor'. The Big Dish is Lamb Pinnekjott with Birch Bark Tamale, lamb ribs are seasoned, birch bark is stuffed with masa and veggies, both are steamed over birch branches and boozy...

programme.title: A is for Apple
programme.desc: Cheese or chocolate? Why not both! In this "C" challenge, host Theresa Visintin takes on both decadent ingredients. But first, she shows us that being cheesy is easy, especially when you stuff chicken breast with creamy goat's cheese and finely diced apples. Theresa takes the flavour one step further by coating the stuffed chicken with sage, parmesan, and panko bread crumbs, then frying it to a crispy golden brown. Next, Theresa whips up a dessert fan favourite, the decadent and oh-so-irresistible dark chocolate lava cake. Finally, Theresa has an irresistible recipe using ooey gooey cheese and warm chocolate.

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.desc: Fun and quirky host Chef Spencer Watts kicks off this episode by showing off his knife skills as he sabres a pineapple to start his instant classic; Grilled Fruit Salad. The pineapple joins a mix of bright summer fruits on the grill, then berries, spicy citrus vinaigrette and savoury feta cheese. Next up, Spencer whips up his Hawaiian Chicken recipe. Spiced with cayenne and Chinese five spice, Spencer stuffs flavourful chicken thighs with pineapple and grills it with a delightful ginger and soy sauce. Every bite is sweet, savoury, and fresh - exactly how summer should taste! Then Spencer shares his top tips for adding smoky flavours to pork using an easy and handy smoke pouch. His Apple...

programme.title: MORE One Big Recipe
programme.desc: Re-join Chef Kimberly Lallouz in her One Big Recipe test kitchen as she masterfully creates a date night feast of mussels in a beer cream sauce, herb crusted tenderloin with pomme puree and red wine sauce, a flourless chocolate torte with raspberry coulee, and watermelon sashimi with pickled grapes.

programme.title: MORE One Big Recipe
programme.desc: Re-join Chef Kimberly Lallouz in her One Big Recipe test kitchen as she masterfully creates a week night feast of baked feta with marinated tomatoes and corn chips, a marinated tomato and jicama salad with cilantro lime dressing, carne molida tacos, and a sous-vide crème caramel.

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.desc: Host Vijaya Selvaraju makes delectable Indian dishes using versatile Indian spices and flavours.

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.sub-title: S01 : E20 Layers of Thai Flavour
programme.desc: Thai host Palin Congchitnant uses fresh Thai ingredients and flavours to make Smoked Trout Salad and a Kaffir Lime Vodka Martini.

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.desc: Barbeque is a go-to cooking method in many cultures. Host Natalia Machado grills up delicious Argentinian barbeque favourites like Empanadas.

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.desc: Sauce is king in Italian cuisine! Warm host Vanessa Gianfrancesco shows us how to cook three simple Italian sauces.

programme.title: A is for Apple
programme.desc: For this "N" challenge, Chef Lauren Gulyas works with noodles and nectarines. For her first dish, Lauren cooks up a breaded nectarine and mozzarella stack. Talking technique, she shows us how to cut nectarines into rounds. She does the same with some soft mozzarella and then walks us through the art of a balsamic reduction. For the noodles, Chef Lauren puts an elegant twist on your childhood favourite with a lobster mac and cheese. She spares no flavours, adding fried bacon, garlic, cayenne pepper, mustard powder, and even dry vermouth. This is no ordinary noodle dish. But now for the real challenge! Chef Lauren works with the noodles and nectarines.

programme.title: A is for Apple
programme.desc: In this episode, Chef Robert Jewell explores recipes using two very different ingredients that start with the letter "O," oats and okra. For his first dish, Robert uses okra in a classic cornmeal cake recipe, but bumps up the flavour factor with spicy jalapenos. Robert balances the heat of the jalapeno with a tart green tomato and crunchy red onion salsa. In his next recipe, Robert keeps the heat, but switches up his recipes for a curry-spiced oat pancake. This Indian inspired dish needs something to cool it down and Robert knows exactly what that is - sweet, silky applesauce! He's up for the challenge when it comes to combining okra and oats into one dish, and the results are tasty!

programme.title: A is for Apple
programme.desc: Culinary expert Theresa Visintin picks the letter "B" and must combine beef with buttermilk for her challenge. But first, she works with the ingredients separately. Silky buttermilk lends itself perfectly to Theresa's battered blooming onion recipe. Using the biggest onion she can find, Theresa skillfully slices from the root down, ensuring it will bloom into a beautiful flower. She coats the Vidalia onion in egg, buttermilk and smoky spiced flour, before deep frying it. Next up, it's time for beef to get the Theresa treatment, as she prepares a crowd favourite- smoky, juicy, fall-off-thebone baked beef brisket. With the perfect balance of sweet and spicy, this meal will make you look...

programme.title: Inside & Out
programme.desc: Today on Inside and Out, our hosts are focused on Social Wellness! Tune in for recipes, yoga, and more!

programme.title: Feed My Soul, V!
programme.desc: Vanessa plans a taco night menu with a table to match! There's chicken taquitos, pulled pork tacos, pico di gallo, guacamole, homemade taco sauce, and so much more!

programme.title: CombiNation Plates
programme.desc: In this episode of CombiNATION Plates, host Bianca Osbourne starts in Mexico with her version of popular street snack, 'Esquites', re-invented here as sweet corn flan. Next is Norway, don't miss explosively exciting quick-smoked Arctic Char with Forage, you've NEVER seen anything like this before. The common ingredient is tacos! From Norway, 'Lefse' is a potato-flour 'tortilla' served with fresh berries and uniquely Scandinavian 'Brunost' cheese. Representing Mexico, check out spicy pork and pineapple 'Tacos al Pastor'. The Big Dish is Lamb Pinnekjott with Birch Bark Tamale, lamb ribs are seasoned, birch bark is stuffed with masa and veggies, both are steamed over birch branches and boozy...

programme.title: Backpack
programme.desc: Driek travels to Coimbra. Where he visits the Santa Cruz Church, a park and Santa Claire monastery. Concluding with a visit to Coimbra University.

programme.title: Bucket List
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Bucket List Ohana, Japan
programme.desc: Daniel Coll & Paddy Doherty explore Japan’s very own Venice. They also see a garden that is straight out of a fantasy.

programme.title: Great World Hotels
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Great World Hotels Desroches 2
programme.desc: Seychelles, with its idyllic natural beauty and slow-paced life is the perfect destination to commune with nature. When Freishia visits this cluster of jewels in the Indian Ocean, she chances upon a tortoise feeding pen and her conversation with the team there gives her insights into the efforts taken by the Island Conservation Society to preserve the beauty of Seychelles.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.desc: Driek today travels to Porto, surrounded by chapela, monasteries and churches. He visits a Wine cellar and learns about wine production of Portugal.

programme.title: 10 Days Cyprus
programme.desc: Lying next to the island's beautiful Mediterranean coastline, in south-western Cyprus, the popular town of Paphos is home to some spectacular archaeological attractions and a rich Cypriot history. Here, Sabrina discovers the myths of the Greek and Roman philosophies, unravels the stories hidden in time at Paphos Archaeological Park, and explores the historic towns of Limassol and Kourion.

programme.title: Bucket List
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Bucket List Sakurajima, Japan
programme.desc: Daniel Coll & Paddy Doherty try different ways to get up, close and personal with Sakurajima, a fuming volcano in Kyushu.

programme.title: World Spas
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 World Spas Chiva Som, Thailand
programme.desc: From an underwater therapy to a massage that detoxes internal organs, Jamie Srubis tries varied spa treatments at the Chiva Som resort in Thailand.

programme.title: Landmarks
programme.desc: Sri Lanka's dalliance with history is legendary and Gal Vihara is simply another jewel in its jewel-studded crown. This rock temple is a carver's most divine dream. It radiates beauty and intricacy.

programme.title: Heritage
programme.desc: Located in the ceremonial county of Wiltshire in southwestern England is the prehistoric Stonehenge Avebury. A 'Henge monument'... Stonehenge literally means 'menhirs' or upright monumental stones

programme.title: Landmarks
programme.desc: How does a simple town square transform into the timeless symbol of a city's soul? Watch the story of London’s iconic Trafalgar Square to find out.

programme.title: Best From The Rest
programme.sub-title: S01 : E40 Best From The Rest Ethiopian Experiences
programme.desc: Ethiopia, the country where mankind has its roots, where the Blue Nile has its source and where human beings first woke up and smelled the coffee, is truly a land of life-affirming experiences. Here is a guide to the top five enriching experiences in this ancient and often overlooked African destination that will nourish your soul.

programme.title: Bucket List
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Bucket List Kagoshima, Japan
programme.desc: Daniel Coll & Paddy Doherty find out some of the best places in Kyushu to try out some local hard liquor, and bonito, a local seafood delicacy.

programme.title: Heritage
programme.desc: The symbol of eternal love, a masterpiece of marble and one among the seven wonders of the world - Taj Mahal - is a tomb built by Mughal Emperor Shah Jahan for his beloved wife Mumtaz Mahal.

programme.title: Landmarks
programme.desc: How does a simple town square transform into the timeless symbol of a city's soul? Watch the story of London’s iconic Trafalgar Square to find out.

programme.title: Unwind
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Unwind Hotel Oriole, Sri Lanka
programme.desc: Indeya visits Oriole Villas where she explores Cinnamon plantations, tries a local dish, witnesses a traditional dance performance, followed by a visit to Galapath temple and Sea turtle hatchery the next day and ends the day with a visit to a water sport center.

programme.title: Best From The Rest
programme.sub-title: S01 : E31 Best From The Rest Oman Must Sees
programme.desc: A stunning contrast of deserts, mountains and beaches, its unspoilt landscape, dotted with grand forts, exquisite palaces, undulating dunes, canyons and lush wadis.

programme.title: Landmarks
programme.desc: Sri Lanka's dalliance with history is legendary and Gal Vihara is simply another jewel in its jewel-studded crown. This rock temple is a carver's most divine dream. It radiates beauty and intricacy.

programme.title: Bucket List
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Bucket List Qura, Japan
programme.desc: From the swords of the Samurai to hidden Christian churches, Daniel Coll & Paddy Doherty get to know some intriguing sides to Japan.

programme.title: 10 Days Cyprus
programme.desc: From being the primary mode of transport for many centuries to helping in the production of olive oil, the donkeys in Cyprus have truly earned the status of the national animal. Our host, Sabrina Chakici finds out more about them and their significance to the country when she visits a donkey farm. She also visits Akamas Peninsula National Park, one of the island country’s last remaining wildernesses.

programme.title: World Heritage
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 World Heritage Agra, India
programme.desc: Travel back in time and explore the monuments and architecture built by the Mughals such as the Taj Mahal and Agra Fort in Agra and Fatehpur Sikri Fort in Fatehpur Sikhri.

programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Backpack Duoro Valley, Portugal

programme.desc: Our host travels to Douro Valley and is seen exploring vineyards and learning about the history behind it. Concluding his journey at Troia and Évora.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.desc: Once an ancient city on the famous Silk Road, Tashkent is a kaleidoscope of mesmerizing art, delectable food, sweeping gardens and eye-catching architecture. Renowned traveller, Alex Outhwaite explores the Uzbekistan capital, where she visits iconic sights such as the Barak-Khan Madrassah, learns about the city’s history, and tries out some local delicacies such as sheesh kebab, horse milk and horse meat.

programme.title: 10 Days Cyprus
programme.desc: Larnaca in Cyprus is one of the world’s 20 most ancient, continuously inhabited cities for the last 4000 years. Travel enthusiast, Sabrina sets out to find out more about the city but is waylaid when she finds a flock of flamingos at a lake side.

programme.title: Bucket List

programme.desc: Daniel Coll & Paddy Doherty attend a unique baseball game at a rather offbeat stadium in Kyushu’s largest city, Fukuoka.

programme.desc: Join our host as he starts his backpacking journey of Portugal, starting from Lisbon. Exploring important monuments from Belem tower to Portas Do Sol.

programme.desc: Indeya visits Oriole Villas where she explores Cinnamon plantations, tries a local dish, witnesses a traditional dance performance, followed by a visit to Galapath temple and Sea turtle hatchery the next day and ends the day with a visit to a water sport center.

programme.title: Heritage
programme.desc: The symbol of eternal love, a masterpiece of marble and one among the seven wonders of the world - Taj Mahal - is a tomb built by Mughal Emperor Shah Jahan for his beloved wife Mumtaz Mahal.

programme.desc: How does a simple town square transform into the timeless symbol of a city's soul? Watch the story of London’s iconic Trafalgar Square to find out.

programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Bucket List Kagoshima, Japan
programme.desc: Daniel Coll & Paddy Doherty find out some of the best places in Kyushu to try out some local hard liquor, and bonito, a local seafood delicacy.

programme.title: Best From The Rest
programme.sub-title: S01 : E31 Best From The Rest Oman Must Sees
programme.desc: A stunning contrast of deserts, mountains and beaches, its unspoilt landscape, dotted with grand forts, exquisite palaces, undulating dunes, canyons and lush wadis.

programme.title: Landmarks
programme.desc: Sri Lanka's dalliance with history is legendary and Gal Vihara is simply another jewel in its jewel-studded crown. This rock temple is a carver's most divine dream. It radiates beauty and intricacy.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 City Breaks Samarkand, Uzbekistan
programme.desc: Samarkand, one of the most popular cities of Uzbekistan, is a city littered with monuments, which span a thousand years of history. From the stories of the Silk Road to the life of the legendary king, Timur, Alex Outhwaite learns about the long, rich history of Samarkand through some of its iconic attractions.

programme.title: Bucket List
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Bucket List Itoshima, Japan
programme.desc: Daniel Coll & Paddy Doherty enjoy treks to waterfalls, fishing and a serene beach sunset in Itoshima - a place in Kyushu which calms the soul.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.desc: Our host travels to Sintra, known for its castles and palaces. Learning and exploring about castles, he further travels to the historic town Obidos.

programme.title: 10 Days Cyprus
programme.desc: Nicosia, the capital of the Republic of Cyprus is also its cultural heartbeat. Sabrina realizes this, as she sets out to unravel the stories of the largest city in Cyprus while being treated to a bath in a Hammam, which was formerly a church.

programme.title: 10 Days Cyprus
programme.desc: In the Troodos ranges of Cyprus, Sabrina Chakici visits the Kykkos Monastery and the ten small village churches, which have become a UNESCO World Heritage Site. She further ventures out to explore the Neolithic village of Khirokitia and learn about the age-old lace tradition in Lefkara village.

programme.title: Great World Hotels
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Great World Hotels Desroches 1
programme.desc: Seychelles is a country of pristine white sandy beaches and turquoise waters that harbour colourful coral reefs and bountiful marine life. Travel enthusiast, Freishia Bomanbehram comes to this tropical paradise looking for fun and relaxation. As she tucks into fresh seafood, goes snorkeling and tries out some catch and release fishing, she realizes that Seychelles has ruined her for all other beach holidays.

programme.title: Bucket List
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Bucket List Gyokuro, Japan
programme.desc: Daniel Coll & Paddy Doherty find out different ways to relish Gyokuro tea, one of the highest grades of tea available in Japan, and visit its source.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.desc: Driek travels to Coimbra. Where he visits the Santa Cruz Church, a park and Santa Claire monastery. Concluding with a visit to Coimbra University.

programme.title: Bucket List
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Bucket List Ohana, Japan
programme.desc: Daniel Coll & Paddy Doherty explore Japan’s very own Venice. They also see a garden that is straight out of a fantasy.

programme.title: Great World Hotels
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Great World Hotels Desroches 2
programme.desc: Seychelles, with its idyllic natural beauty and slow-paced life is the perfect destination to commune with nature. When Freishia visits this cluster of jewels in the Indian Ocean, she chances upon a tortoise feeding pen and her conversation with the team there gives her insights into the efforts taken by the Island Conservation Society to preserve the beauty of Seychelles.

programme.title: 10 Days Cyprus
programme.desc: Lying next to the island's beautiful Mediterranean coastline, in south-western Cyprus, the popular town of Paphos is home to some spectacular archaeological attractions and a rich Cypriot history. Here, Sabrina discovers the myths of the Greek and Roman philosophies, unravels the stories hidden in time at Paphos Archaeological Park, and explores the historic towns of Limassol and Kourion.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.desc: Driek today travels to Porto, surrounded by chapela, monasteries and churches. He visits a Wine cellar and learns about wine production of Portugal.

programme.title: Backpack

programme.desc: Our host travels to Douro Valley and is seen exploring vineyards and learning about the history behind it. Concluding his journey at Troia and Évora.

programme.title: 10 Days Cyprus
programme.desc: From being the primary mode of transport for many centuries to helping in the production of olive oil, the donkeys in Cyprus have truly earned the status of the national animal. Our host, Sabrina Chakici finds out more about them and their significance to the country when she visits a donkey farm. She also visits Akamas Peninsula National Park, one of the island country’s last remaining wildernesses.

programme.desc: From ancient Athens to the modern Contemporary Institute of Art in Boston, the series progresses while honouring art as the Red Bull Cliff Diving World Series 2024 moves on to its second stop

programme.title: More than a Dive
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 Home awaits cliff divers
programme.desc: The spectacular charm of Polignano a Mare serves as a stunning backdrop for the third stop of the cliff diving season in Italy, where Rhiannan Iffland reigns as queen in the female division.

programme.title: Bang on Time
programme.desc: Freeskiers and wingsuit pilots come together in a world premiere. As skiers perform tricks, they’ll be accompanied by the Red Bull Skydive Team performing an airborne spin-and-flip at the same time.

programme.title: Mission to the Edge of Space
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Mission to the Edge of Space
programme.desc: The team behind the Red Bull Stratos mission battles mechanical failures, hostile weather, and internal demons to make Felix Baumgartner's historic jump possible.

programme.title: Don't Look Down
programme.desc: 2,000ft in the air. Sub-zero temperatures. Who said you can't ride a BMX park in the sky? This is how Kriss Kyle's daring idea grew into a mind-boggling feat of aeronautical engineering and BMX-riding skill.

programme.title: More than a Dive
programme.desc: The cliffs of the Causeway Coast in Northern Ireland provide a dramatic backdrop for the 27m dives, showcasing the power of nature and the skills of the cliff divers in this new location for 2024.

programme.title: More than a Dive
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 The stage is yours
programme.desc: Rhiannan Iffland leads, with Molly Carlson in second, as the season resumes at Oslo's Opera House. Facing windy conditions on the longest platform, Constantin Popovici tackles a hard dive after injury.

programme.title: More than a Dive
programme.sub-title: S02 : E06 Red Bull Cliff Diving debuts in Montreal
programme.desc: Team Canada dominates their home event with Carlson leading the charge. Lichtenstein battles for the top, Hunt returns to 27m, and Heslop aims to take the series lead in his new hometown.

programme.title: Life of Kai
programme.desc: Kai Lenny kicks off the big wave season at Jaws, facing the risks that come with his pursuit of progression, then Maui water safety bands together after fires ravage the town of Lahaina.

programme.title: Life of Kai
programme.desc: Kai Lenny surfs the same swell at both Jaws and Mavericks, then confronts the risks vs rewards of big wave surfing after suffering a serious injury at Pipeline, the most dangerous wave in the world.

programme.title: Life of Kai
programme.desc: Surf brothers Kai and Ridge Lenny relive their epic XXL wave ride at Maui's Jaws surf spot, and Kai lets us go BTS to take a look at his state-of-the-art surf equipment testing.

programme.title: Reel Rock
programme.desc: After a breakthrough comp season in 2021, Natalia Grossman became the first American in 20 years to be the IFSC Climbing World Cup champion. Now, she's in the unfamiliar position of having to defend her title.

programme.title: Reel Rock
programme.sub-title: S09 : E02 Burning the flame part 1
programme.desc: Big wall free climbing masters Babsi and Jacopo seek their greatest challenge yet: a free ascent of Eternal Flame, an elusive 3,000ft (914km). route up the legendary Nameless Tower in Pakistan.

programme.title: Reel Rock
programme.sub-title: S09 : E03 Burning the flame part 2
programme.desc: With a fleeting weather window and the season coming to a close, Babsi Zangerl and Jacopo Larcher must conquer countless hard pitches in freezing temps to finish what they started.

programme.sub-title: S08 : E04 Adventure Bike: Episode 4: Suzuki V-Strom 1050 XT
programme.desc: Clare gets to ride the Suzuki V-Strom 1050 XT, but do it's retro rally looks match the engine? Tales from the Trails has the lads get the sidecar onto the Trans Euro Trail, before visiting a race track. Graham talks about his Bromance with his motorcycling inspiration, and Sam starts his rally dream with a build and roadbook training, which doesn't go to plan.

programme.desc: The much-loved 1221m Åsum Ring circuit, will host this major event in an ideal setting for spectacular battles. programme.title: Winter Games New Zealand - Park Jam Team Challenge
programme.desc: Building on the success of the Big Air, get ready for the next thrilling New Zealand Winter Games episode, The Park Jam Team Challenge! Witness the fusion of skill and creativity as Freestyle Skiers and Snowboarders showcase their prowess in this high-energy competition.

programme.title: Winter Games New Zealand - Back Country Freestyle Challenge
programme.desc: Back to the third episode of the New Zealand Winter Games 2023! This time, we dive into the exhilarating world of Back Country Freestyle, where athletes shows their skills in the untouched winter landscapes in the southern Alps of New Zealand. Get ready for an adrenaline-packed adventure!

programme.title: Greenlandic
programme.desc: In today´s episode we have the ultimate journey into the heart of Greenland´s rich culture and untamed backcountry. Join us as we explore the breathtaking landcapes of this Artic wonderland. It´s the paradise for every passionate freeskier. Let´s check out!

programme.title: FIA Karting European Championship - Kristianstad (SWE)
programme.desc: FIA Karting European ChampionshipsThis time we are in Sweden to have a look at a rather unusual motorsport event. Almost every motorsport pilot has started his carrer in a Kart. Let´s see how europe´s new pilot generation is doing on the scandinavian course.

programme.title: World E-Bike Series 2022 Round 3 & 4
programme.desc: In todays Episode we´re traveling to France & Belgium for round 3 & 4 of the World E-Bike Series. The World’s best male & female mountain bikers are going to battle out who will take the lead in the middle of the racing calendar.

programme.title: Golden Fly Series 2022 - Schaan (LIE)
programme.desc: On September 11th, the world’s best long jumpers and pole vaulters took once again flight on a certified mobile athletics facility that enables the athletes to use the same runway.

programme.title: FIA Karting World Championships (KZ/KZ2)
programme.desc: The first of the two world championship events of the 2022 FIA Karting season offers a very attractive programme with five categories and more than 320 drivers taking part in Le Mans (FRA) from 1st to 4th September.

programme.title: World E-Bike Series 2022 Round 5 & 6
programme.desc: A long and exciting World E-Bike Series season enters its final two rounds in Girona and Barcelona. Who will be crowned the winner of the series this year? Let´s check out!

programme.title: The Art of Canyoning
programme.desc: The Art of Canyoning führt dem TV-Publikum diese junge Sportart vor. Spannung, Action, Natur und sportliches Können stehen auf dem Programm, wenn fünf der weltbesten Canyoning-Profis einige der schönsten Orte im Schweizer Kanton Tessin bezwingen.

programme.title: Die Kunst des Outdoorsports
programme.desc: In this show we follow the adidas Outdoor Sports Team for venturesome jumps, fast downhills and balancing acts in dizzy heights. Canyoning in Ticino and Unicycling and Highlining in the Dolomites are the highlights of this outstanding adventures show.

programme.title: The Barrel - Teil 1
programme.desc: Seit die erste Welle geritten wurde, haben Surfer Geschichten und Erfahrungen ausgetauscht, um zu versuchen, die Magie zu erklären, die in den Wellen steckt, die sie reiten.

programme.title: People in Motion
programme.desc: People of Motion is a sport documentary about a group of people who turn to parkour in their lives -- sometimes to get rid of frustration, sometimes just to feel the ground and be part of something.

programme.title: Simple Session 2024 - BMX Final
programme.desc: Simple Session wurde im Jahr 2000 ins Leben gerufen und hat sich von einem Kleinstadt-Wettbewerb zu einem der größten und renommiertesten BMX- und Skateboard-Wettbewerbe der Welt entwickelt. Die Simple Session 24 kehrt am 24.-25. August in ihre Heimatstadt Tartu zurück.

programme.title: Queen & King of the Court #04
programme.desc: The sands of Doha are set to witness the grand finale of the 2023 Queen & King of the Court Crown Series, marking the culmination of a thrilling series of events that kicked off in Miami earlier this year.

programme.title: Dream Job
programme.desc: A comedy documentary about a girl working in the ski industry who decides to become one of the stars: they go up, they go down, how difficult can it be? Needless to say, she finds out how hard it really can be.

programme.title: Reconnect One - USA
programme.desc: Sarka and Cheryl, who haven't seen each other in years, have decided to reunite and embark on a tour of their own. Having once traveled together on the contest scene for over 15 years, life led them to different corners of the West Coast of America.

programme.title: GKA World Tour Season Wrap Up
programme.desc: The Qatar Airways GKA Kite World Tour has just wrapped up a record-breaking year packed with drama and excitement. The stars of the sport pushed kiteboarding to new highs in 2023 in their single-minded quest for world titles.

programme.title: FIA Karting European Championship - Kristianstad (SWE)
programme.desc: FIA Karting European ChampionshipsThis time we are in Sweden to have a look at a rather unusual motorsport event. Almost every motorsport pilot has started his carrer in a Kart. Let´s see how europe´s new pilot generation is doing on the scandinavian course.

programme.title: Between Home
programme.desc: "Between Home" is an adventure documentary about Nick Jaffe. Nick decides to sail solo from the UK to Australia, negotiating the treacherous waters of the Pacific and Atlantic Oceans.

programme.title: Motosurf World Championship - Båstad (SWE)
programme.desc: Set against the stunning backdrop of the Swedish coastline, the world’s best motosurfers are ready to go head-to-head. Speed, skill, and pure passion - these are the ingredients for thrilling races on the water. Who will claim the title here in Båstad?

programme.title: European Freestyle Pro Tour 2023 - Season Wrap Up
programme.desc: European Freestyle Pro Tour 2023 - Season Wrap UpIn This weeks episode we take a look at the season wrap up of the European Freestyle Pro Tour 2023. Let´s check out Europes best wavesailors, competing at the bests spots on the Contoinent

programme.title: SSL Gold Cup
programme.desc: Final Series 2023 - World Class Sailing - SSL Gold Cup 2023Der SSL Gold Cup ist eine spannende Ausscheidungsserie und wird auf den Kanarischen Inseln ausgetragen. Die 24 besten Nationen der SSL-Rangliste und 16 Nationen aus der Qualifikationsserie nehmen daran teil.

programme.title: Reconnect Two - USA
programme.desc: Today we continue our North American Odyssey with Sarka Pancochova and Cheryl Maas in Reconnect Two. From Mt Baker and the legendary Bank Slalom to backcountry kickers in Bend get ready for the full Pacific Northwest snowboard experience.

programme.desc: The Mediterranean Epic offers an UCI 4 stage race where mountain bikers enjoy mountain biking to the fullest during the route around Oropesa del Mar - Castellón (Spain).

programme.title: One Water Race 2024 52min
programme.desc: Das Konzept ist einfach: Wer von Arholma im Norden aus als Erster Landsort im Süden erreicht, wird zum Sieger gekürt. Laufen und Schwimmen sind die einzigen Fortbewegungsarten. Es gibt keine Streckenführung und freie Wahl der Route.

programme.desc: ENGADINSNOW is one of the longest-running freeride competitions in the Alps. Apart from its long tradition, this event classic has always been all about innovation.

programme.desc: The LAAX OPEN 2021 takes place from 19-23 January 2021, kicking off the FIS Snowboard World Cup Tour 20/21 in the disciplines Slopestyle and Halfpipe and is endowed with 140,000 CHF prize money.

programme.desc: The season kick-off of the world’s most important freeride series for skiers and snowboarders will be held at Hakuba (JPN).

programme.title: Kitesports Insights & X-Project
programme.desc: We start with a look at the kiteboarding and wing-foiling scene. Then we travel to the picturesque Swiss valley of Engadine, where some of the world’s best board-sports athletes have come together for a special winter sports venture: X-Project.

programme.title: LINE OF SIGHT | A Look into Wingsuit BASE Jumping
programme.desc: The golden age of wingsuiting is upon us. Through evolving suit technology the initial inflation time has gone down, which has lead to quicker starts and more exits. Wingsuit athletes Marshal Miller, Jesse Hall, and Sean Chuma take you through the iconic jumps.

programme.title: Qatar Airways GKA Freestyle Kite World Cup 2022 - Neom (KSA)
programme.desc: The second event of the GKA Freestyle World Cup season will see the world’s best freestyle kiters re-start their campaigns towards the Qatar Airways GKA Kite World Championship title that culminates in Brazil next month.

programme.title: World Rookie Tour Finals 2022
programme.desc: In today’s Episode we´ll give you the full dose of Freestyle Snowboarding and Skiing. Young talented Athletes from all over the world can demonstrate their skills during the World Rookie Tour 2022.

programme.title: New Zealand Winter Games 2022 Episode #01
programme.desc: The North Face Frontier 4* show is a kiwi freeride institution at the iconic Remarkables Ski Area in Queenstown. It runs in a weather window between Saturday 3rd and Thursday 8th September and is a big mountain freeride competition.

programme.title: Beach Wrestling World Series Finals 2022
programme.desc: Eight world champions to be crowned in fifth and final leg of the 2022 Beach Wrestling World Series in Constanta, Romania, on September 3 to 4. 120 beach wrestler from fight for this years world champion titles in different weight classes.

programme.title: Red Bull Romaniacs 2023 - Sibiu (ROU) - 150min LIVEmaniacs Summary
programme.desc: In this year’s anniversary edition, competitors from 55+ nations will be competing, among them the world’s best hard enduro riders like Manuel Lettenbichler (GER), Graham Jarvis (UK), Wade Young (RSA), Mario Roman (ESP), Michael Walkner (AUT).

programme.title: FIA Karting European Championship - Kristianstad (SWE)
programme.desc: FIA Karting European ChampionshipsThis time we are in Sweden to have a look at a rather unusual motorsport event. Almost every motorsport pilot has started his carrer in a Kart. Let´s see how europe´s new pilot generation is doing on the scandinavian course.

programme.title: Golden Roof Challenge - Innsbruck (AUT)
programme.desc: The Golden Roof Challenge returns to the heart of Innsbruck, Austria for its big 20th anniversary!On May 18th, the world’s best Long Jumpers and Pole Vaulters will compete for important world ranking points in order to qualify for the Olympic Games in Paris!

programme.title: BACK TO NORMAL
programme.desc: For Ian Mitchard jumping out of airplanes and soaring above the earth with a nylon canopy is as normal as walking through the grocery store. But when a dramatic accident put the lifestyle he loves in jeopardy, Ian is forced to grapple with his body.

programme.title: 4Islands - Croatia
programme.desc: 4Islands MTB Croatia will welcome over 370 mountain bikers from all over the world for a five-day race on four Croatian islands. This year the order of the islands will be slightly different, starting with Krk, Cres, Lošinj and ending on Rab.

programme.title: Škoda Titan Desert Series - Morocco
programme.desc: Welcome to World of Freesport and the mystic deserts of Morocco, where Athletes are not only fighting nature, but also one of the hardest racetracks on the planet. The dunes… The navigation…. The suffering… The legend…. The desert! The Skoda Titan Desert Morocco.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2022 - stop #2 - Ordino Arcalís (AND)
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Freeride World Tour 2022 "Live Summary"
programme.desc: Following the inaugural event at Baqueira Beret (ESP) last weekend, the Freeride World Tour returns to the perennial Pyrenean freeride mecca of Ordino Arcalís, Andorra!

programme.title: FIA Karting European Championship - Kristianstad (SWE)
programme.desc: FIA Karting European ChampionshipsThis time we are in Sweden to have a look at a rather unusual motorsport event. Almost every motorsport pilot has started his carrer in a Kart. Let´s see how europe´s new pilot generation is doing on the scandinavian course.

programme.title: Underdog
programme.desc: The Ultra-Trail du Mont-Blanc© - Edition 2018171 kilometers - 10,000 meters ascent - 2,300 runnersFor the 2018 UTMB© Damian Hall is ranked 50th by the International Trail Running Association© (ITRA© ).

programme.title: 13 Faces of Valais - Teil 2
programme.desc: An unique and adventures journey through the heart of the canton Valais - from the highest peaks to the river mouth of the Rhone. 13 faces, 13 stories, 13 facettes in the rhythm of the 4 seasons.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: Rico Verhoeven defends his title against Jamal Ben Saddik, Gokhan Saki Returns, Maslobojev, Plazibat, Duut and more.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: New Middleweight Champion Alex Pereira puts his title on the line against Yousri Belgaroui. Also, former champion Nieky Holzken returns to face Alim Nabiyev and D’Angelo Marshall meets Ismael Londt in a heavyweight showdown.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: Lightweight contender tournament semifinals and finals are featured for GLORY 49, Rotterdam

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: GLORY Heavyweight Champion Rico Verhoeven puts his title on the line against Jamal Ben Saddik. Michael Duut and Danyo Ilunga meet in a rematch and Petchpanomrung takes on Zakaria Zouggary.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: A stacked SUPERFIGHT SERIES card is headlined by former welterweight champion Murthel ‘The Predator’ Groenhart (68-23-3, 39 KO’s) and rising threat Alim Nabiyev (50-7, 21 KO’s). The winner will forcefully insert his name into the title shot conversation.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: Two world title fights headline GLORY 64 STRASBOURG on Saturday, March 9 as GLORY makes its first visit to the historic French city.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: Micheletti takes on Susperregui in the main event of the GLORY 69 Super Fight Series.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: Headlining the event is a Light Heavyweight Title Fight between current Champion Sergej Maslobojev and top ranked contender Donegi Abena. A Middleweight Title Bout between Champion Donovan Wisse and current number one contender Cesar Almeida will serve as the event’s co-headliner. Also featured on the card is a middleweight bout between top-five contenders Serkan Ozcaglayan and Sergej Braun. Plus, perennial lightweight contender Guerric Billet will meet Cihad Akipa. GLORY 83 will also mark the promotional debuts for both Uku Jurjendal and Nabil Khachab, who will square off against each other in a heavyweight bout. Additionally, rising featherweight contender Ahmad Chikh Mousa will look to...

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: GLORY 85 will feature the four-man heavyweight tournament featuring two-time tournament finalist Jahfarr Wilnis (33-13-1, 8 KO), Heavyweight newcomer Murat Aygun (33-3-0), Nigerian giant Tariq ‘Cookie’ Osaro (22-2-1), and ‘The Iron Bull’ Enver Sljivar (40-6, 23 KO). A kickboxing legend will also make his return on April 29 as former two-time GLORY champion Murthel Groenhart (69-25-3, 40 KO) challenges current welterweight champion Endy Semeleer (33-1, 17 KO) for the title.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: In the main event, featherweight champ Petch (168-39-3, 27 KO) looks to defend his crown for the sixth time when he welcomes the challenge of local hero Ahmad Chikh Mousa (58-8-1, 28 KO). The co-main event will see a crucial fight between Romania’s Benjamin Adegbuyi (35-8, 20 KO) and Sofian Laïdouni (35-2-1, 17 KO) of France that will decide who will qualify for the GLORY Heavyweight Grand Prix in December.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: The interim-GLORY Heavyweight Title will be up for grabs as top ranked heavyweight contender Antonio Plazibat (22-4, 16 KO) collides with the number two ranked Tariq ‘Cookie’ Osaro (24-2-1, 12 KO) in the main event. These teammates will have to put their friendship aside for one night and go head-to-head for GLORY gold. Also on the card are title fights in the Middleweight, Welterweight and Light Heavyweight divisions.
